document.full_text: while jimmer fredette's legacy at brigham young is secure, one of the biggest questions hovering over him is how his game will translate to the n.b.a. the prediction: good offense, weak defense.
document.title: 2011 n.c.a.a. tournament: round of 16: n.b.a. scouting report on fredette: good but not great
